allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive SEO optimization and error handling

- Add JSON-LD schemas \(Organization, WebSite, Article, FAQ, Breadcrumb, Product\)
- Create dynamic sitemap.xml and robots.txt
- Add OpenGraph and Twitter cards to all pages
- Add hreflang alternates for multilingual SEO
- Add BreadcrumbSchema to main pages
- Create custom 404 and 500 error pages
- Add PWA manifest
- Add security headers \(HSTS, X-Frame-Options, etc.\)
- Improve image alt texts for accessibility
- Add metadataBase for proper OG image resolution
- Fix footer navigation links

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(for file in ar.json tr.json ru.json fa.json fr.json)
Bash(for f in messages/en.json messages/ar.json messages/tr.json messages/ru.json messages/fa.json messages/fr.json)
Bash(for f in messages/en.json messages/ar.json messages/tr.json messages/fr.json messages/ru.json messages/fa.json)
